content: the first stitch on lhn from back to front knit the picked-up stitch through the front loop so that it twists to the right working a twisted ll1 insert the tip of the lhn into the left leg of the twisted stitch two row below the last worked stitch on the rhn from front to back knit the picked-up stitch through the back loop so it twists to the left karjalan neito socks page 5/5
